body:
For now, I'm just going to list some tools I've created...

### [Baze](https://github.com/svallory/Baze)

My first really big coding project! It's a php frmework inspired by .Net.

### [HamlPHP](https://github.com/hamlphp/HamlPHP)

A php parser for the [haml language](haml-lang.com)

### [Flexer](https://github.com/svallory/Flexer)

An extenxible inflector for .Net 

### [EdmxTypist](https://github.com/svallory/EdmxTypist)

A cyber typist which will help you fix your EntityFramework .edmx files. It formats the names of Entities, properties and more on an configurable, automated way.

### [Giix Haml](https://github.com/svallory/giix-haml)

Yii Gii eXtended + Haml templates and some improvements

### [Yii Boilerplate](https://github.com/svallory/yii-boilerplate)

The new kid on the block. It's going to be a common setup of an yii app. With a lot of stuff pre-configured for you.

Come on... Don't stop here! Go take a look!

Cheers!
tagline: Which means... I like to build tools!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: I am the Blacksmith
